## Description {#details}

A wrapper predicate designed for use with std::remove&#95;if.

This predicate wraps a predicate suitable for use with std::remove&#95;if to call set&#95;.erase(x) on each element which is slated for removal.

Definition at line 335 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/setvector-h">SetVector.h</a>.
